name: tawn-cli
description: Run any command and play a cross-platform notification sound when it finishes.

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && bun build src/index.ts --target=node --format=esm --sourcemap --outdir=dist --entry-naming=index.js && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const cp=require('child_process');const p='dist/index.js';const c=fs.readFileSync(p,'utf8');if(!c.startsWith('#!/usr/bin/env node')){fs.writeFileSync(p,'#!/usr/bin/env node\n'+c)};fs.chmodSync(p,0o755);cp.execSync('mkdir -p dist/sounds && cp -R src/sounds/* dist/sounds || true');"
